quote: Rarely do we find men who willingly engage in hard, solid thinking. There is an almost universal quest for easy answers and half-baked solutions. Nothing pains some people more than having to think.
quote_letters: RARELY DO WE FIND MEN WHO WILLINGLY ENGAGE IN HARD SOLID THINKING THERE IS AN ALMOST UNIVERSAL QUEST FOR EASY ANSWERS AND HALF-BAKED SOLUTIONS NOTHING PAINS SOME PEOPLE MORE THAN HAVING TO THINK
